parameters.name: NCount
parameters.description: Number of bodies to move or rotate and copy

title: IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData.IGetBodies
description: Gets the bodies to move or rotate and copy.

parameters.name: NCount
parameters.description: Number of bodies to move or rotate and copy

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bodies of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::GetBodiesCount
before calling this method.
Use:
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::Copy
to get whether to copy the bodies
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::TransformType
to get whether to move or rotate the bodies
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
